page.title: 11BUS - SEAVIEW SERVICES
page.content: { Seaview Services}was first started in 1922. This is the only{private bus {company}on the Isle of Wight. All the other bus routes belong to Southern Vectis. The{bus route}goes from Seaview to Ryde Bus Station and is 8 km in distance. The full single{fare}is 35p for adults and 18p for children. There are 11 request stops and 2 compulsary stops. There are 17 buses running each day during the summer. The first bus is at 0740 hrs and the last bus is at 2140 hrs. The{main users}of this route in the winter are residents of Seaview travelling to Ryde. In the summer the main users are holiday makers who are staying at the two Warner's holiday camps at Puckpool.
